```{r}
library(textstem)
library(tokenizers)
library(stopwords)
```

```{r Load Data}
vc <- read.csv('vote_collections.csv')
```

```{r Tokenize & Lemmatize}
vc$tokenized_title <- tokenize_words(vc$title, stopwords = stopwords())

# Remove digit-only tokens
vc$tokenized_title <- lapply(tokenized_titles, function(tokens) tokens[!grepl('^[0-9]+$', tokens)])

# Remove roman numerals i-iii
vc$tokenized_title <- lapply(tokenized_titles, function(tokens) tokens[!grepl('^[i]+$', tokens)])

# Lemmatize
vc$lemmatized_title <- lemmatize_words(tokenized_titles)
```

```{r Count}
common_words <- table(unlist(vc$lemmatized_title))
common_words <- as.data.frame(sort(common_words, decreasing = TRUE))
common_words <- common_words[1:50,]
````
